pr_title: Add batching to miner resource request when mining

timeline.message: Add batching to miner resource request when mining

timeline.bodyText:
That looks simpler than what I would've expected even.
I would make the resourceBatchSize a getter which on default returns 1  (in the abstract building of the structure builders) and in the miner returns 10.
Such that here we request requestCount * getResourceBatchSize
timeline.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText: This way instead of requesting 32 planks and 32 fences, we request 30/40 (which is a better ratio considering what we need too)
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.message: Change to getter, with override in miner

timeline.author: Raycoms
